response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just an object; it's a symbol of craftsmanship and passion. I believe its true worth exceeds $10,000, but I am willing to consider your offer. To start our discussion, I am extending an initial offer of $15,000 for this product. I trust that its significance to you will justify this price. Let's explore if we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 15000}
